spring.name: Spring
spring.psychology: Spring is the season of Wood, representing growth, renewal, and creativity. Embrace new beginnings and let your spirit bloom.

summer.name: Summer
summer.psychology: Summer belongs to Fire, symbolizing energy, joy, and connection. Let your inner light shine bright and embrace the warmth of life.

autumn.name: Autumn
autumn.psychology: Autumn is the season of Metal, bringing structure, reflection, and letting go. Focus on what truly matters and find peace in simplicity.

winter.name: Winter
winter.psychology: Winter is the season of Water, representing stillness, wisdom, and conservation. Turn inward to recharge and connect with your deepest self.

new_year.name: New Year
new_year.psychology: A time for renewal and celebration. Embrace the festive spirit and welcome the auspicious energy of the coming year.

common.wechat_share_message: Please use WeChat scan to share this page

home.hero_subtitle: Ancient Wisdom for the Modern Muse
home.hero_desc: Discover your inner balance and harmony through the fusion of Eastern philosophy, Five Elements wisdom, and modern lifestyle aesthetics.
home.philosophy_1_desc: We translate the profound Five Elements theory into practical, stylish advice for your home and wellness. Find balance in a chaotic world.
home.philosophy_2_desc: Discover your dominant element archetype. Are you the creative Wood, the passionate Fire, or the reflective Water? Know yourself, heal yourself.
home.philosophy_3_desc: Embrace the beauty of imperfection (Wabi-sabi) and the clarity of Zen. Create a sanctuary that nourishes your soul.
home.join_desc: Join the Silk & Sage community and explore the perfect fusion of Eastern wisdom and modern life with like-minded modern muses.
home.popular_desc: Discover the most loved lifestyle guides from our community

mission.heading: Our Mission
mission.text: At Silk & Sage, our mission is to empower the modern soul by harmonizing the profound timeless wisdom of Eastern philosophy with the aesthetics of contemporary living. We believe that true luxury lies in balance—between the inner self and the outer world, between tradition and innovation.

vision.heading: Our Vision
vision.text: We envision a world where everyone can access the tools for spiritual grounding and aesthetic elevation, creating a life that is not only beautiful to look at but meaningful to live.

items.title: Harmony (He)
items.description: Seeking balance in all things, inspired by the 'Middle Way' and Five Elements theory.

items.title: Wisdom (Zhi)
items.description: Curating deep, actionable insights from thousands of years of human experience.

items.title: Aesthetics (Mei)
items.description: Celebrating beauty in simplicity, wabi-sabi, and intentional design.

items.title: Authenticity (Zhen)
items.description: Staying true to oneself and honoring the genuine roots of cultural heritage.

whatWeDo.heading: What We Do
whatWeDo.intro: We provide a sanctuary for discovery and growth through three main pillars:

services.title: Eastern Insight
services.description: Decoding ancient systems like the I Ching, Feng Shui, and Five Elements into accessible guidance for modern dilemmas.

services.title: Lifestyle Design
services.description: Offering curated inspiration for home decor, fashion, and wellness that aligns with your personal energy.

services.title: Digital Tools
services.description: Empowering you with AI-driven tools for self-discovery, from element quizzes to daily energy forecasts.

philosophy.heading: Our Philosophy
paragraphs: The name 'Silk & Sage' represents the dual nature of our existence. 'Silk' symbolizes refinement, beauty, and the flowing adaptability of water. 'Sage' represents wisdom, grounding, and the healing power of nature.

We believe that modern anxiety often stems from a disconnection from natural rhythms. By reintegrating these rhythms into our daily lives—through the colors we wear, the way we arrange our rooms, and the moments we take to reflect—we can reclaim our inner peace.

team.heading: The Team
team.description: We are a diverse collective of designers, developers, and cultural researchers passionate about spiritual wellness and technology. United by a love for Eastern culture and modern design, we build tools that we use ourselves every day.

contact.heading: Connect With Us
contact.text: Have questions, suggestions, or just want to share your journey? We'd love to hear from you.
